name: Dragon, Fly?
description:
A dragon who just learned to fly attempts to leave the cave for the first time. Developed in 12 hours for #1BitWeekend.

Flap your wings to stay aloft and avoid obstacles.

Controls:
Q - Left wing UP
A - Left wing DOWN
E - Right wing UP
D - Right wing DOWN
Space - Restart

GitHub repo: https://github.com/waronson/Dragon-Fly

Audio credits:
Background music: https://opengameart.org/content/perces
Victory music: https://opengameart.org/content/free-run-8-bitish
Death sound: https://opengameart.org/content/bombexplosion8bit
